issue.title: [C++] String swap case kernel
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-12946](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12946). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Changes lowercase characters to uppercase and uppercase characters to lowercase, like Python `str.swapcase()`

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12946?focusedCommentId=17393072) by Antoine Pitrou (apitrou):*
Issue resolved by pull request 10855
